com.epoch.utils

Class DateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.utils.DateUtils

  • public final class DateUtils
extends Object
    For manipulating java.util.Date.

      • convertUnits

        private static double convertUnits(double time,
                                   int from,
                                   int to)
        Converts a time interval among seconds/minutes/hours/days.
        Parameters:
        time - the time interval
        from - the unit of the time interval
        to - the desired unit of the time interval
        Returns:
        the time interval in the new unit

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • main
